001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.builders;
002
003import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control.CreateIDPRequest;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control.DeleteIDPRequest;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control.SetIDPSegmentRequest;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.IDPSegmentRequest;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.IDPSettingsRequest;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.ProfileStatusRequest;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.IDPSegmentResponse;
011import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.IDPSettingsResponse;
012import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.ProfileStatusResponse;
013
014import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
015
016import java.util.ArrayList;
017import java.util.Comparator;
018import java.util.List;
019import java.util.Optional;
020
021/**
022 * IDPManager provides a loose abstraction over processing insulin delivery profile (IDP) response
023 * manages, generating the requests necessary to get a full state of the profiles on the pump, and
024 * generating request messages in the correct format for making mutations on pump profiles.
025 */
026public class IDPManager {
027    public static class Profile {
028        private IDPSettingsResponse idpSettingsResponse;
029        private List<IDPSegmentResponse> segments = new ArrayList<>();
030        public Profile(IDPSettingsResponse idpSettingsResponse) {
031            this.idpSettingsResponse = idpSettingsResponse;
032        }
033
034        public boolean isComplete() {
035            return segments.size() == idpSettingsResponse.getNumberOfProfileSegments();
036        }
037
038        public IDPSettingsResponse getIdpSettingsResponse() {
039            return idpSettingsResponse;
040        }
041
042        public int getIdpId() {
043            return idpSettingsResponse.getIdpId();
044        }
045
046        public List<IDPSegmentResponse> getSegments() {
047            Validate.isTrue(isComplete());
048            return segments;
049        }
050
051        public Message deleteProfileMessage() {
052            return new DeleteIDPRequest(getIdpId());
053        }
054
055        public Message duplicateProfileMessage(String newProfileName) {
056            return new CreateIDPRequest(newProfileName, getIdpId());
057        }
058
059        public Message deleteSegmentMessage(IDPSegmentResponse segment) {
060            Validate.isTrue(segment.getIdpId() == getIdpId());
061            Validate.isTrue(segment.getSegmentIndex() != 0, "Deleting the 0th segment index is not supported");
062            return new SetIDPSegmentRequest(getIdpId(), 0 /* ??? */, segment.getSegmentIndex(),
063                    SetIDPSegmentRequest.IDPSegmentOperation.DELETE_SEGMENT_ID,
064                    segment.getProfileStartTime(), segment.getProfileBasalRate(), segment.getProfileCarbRatio(), segment.getProfileTargetBG(), segment.getProfileISF(),
065                    segment.getIdpStatusId());
066        }
067
068        public Message modifySegmentMessage(IDPSegmentResponse segment) {
069            Validate.isTrue(segment.getIdpId() == getIdpId());
070            int statusId = 0;
071            return new SetIDPSegmentRequest(getIdpId(), 0 /* ??? */, segment.getSegmentIndex(),
072                    SetIDPSegmentRequest.IDPSegmentOperation.MODIFY_SEGMENT_ID,
073                    segment.getProfileStartTime(), segment.getProfileBasalRate(), segment.getProfileCarbRatio(), segment.getProfileTargetBG(), segment.getProfileISF(),
074                    IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.toBitmask( // 31
075                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.BASAL_RATE,
076                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.CARB_RATIO,
077                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.TARGET_BG,
078                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.CORRECTION_FACTOR,
079                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.START_TIME));
080        }
081
082        public Message createSegmentMessage(int profileStartTime, int profileBasalRate, long profileCarbRatio, int profileTargetBG, int profileISF) {
083            return new SetIDPSegmentRequest(getIdpId(), 0 /* ??? */, 0,
084                    SetIDPSegmentRequest.IDPSegmentOperation.CREATE_SEGMENT,
085                    profileStartTime, profileBasalRate, profileCarbRatio, profileTargetBG, profileISF,
086                    IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.toBitmask( // 31
087                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.BASAL_RATE,
088                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.CARB_RATIO,
089                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.TARGET_BG,
090                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.CORRECTION_FACTOR,
091                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.START_TIME));
092        }
093
094        private void processMessage(Message message) {
095            if (message instanceof IDPSegmentResponse) {
096                int idpId = ((IDPSegmentResponse) message).getIdpId();
097                Validate.isTrue(idpId == getIdpId());
098
099                int segmentIndex = ((IDPSegmentResponse) message).getSegmentIndex();
100                segments.removeIf(s -> segmentIndex == s.getSegmentIndex());
101                segments.add((IDPSegmentResponse) message);
102                segments.sort(Comparator.comparingInt(IDPSegmentResponse::getSegmentIndex));
103            } else if (message instanceof IDPSettingsResponse) {
104                int idpId = ((IDPSettingsResponse) message).getIdpId();
105                Validate.isTrue(idpId == getIdpId());
106
107                idpSettingsResponse = (IDPSettingsResponse) message;
108            }
109        }
110
111    }
112
113    private final List<Profile> profiles = new ArrayList<>();
114    private ProfileStatusResponse profileStatusResponse;
115
116    public IDPManager() {}
117    public IDPManager(ProfileStatusResponse profileStatusResponse) {
118        this.profileStatusResponse = profileStatusResponse;
119    }
120
121    public List<Message> nextMessages() {
122        List<Message> messages = new ArrayList<>();
123
124        if (profileStatusResponse == null) {
125            messages.add(new ProfileStatusRequest());
126            return messages;
127        }
128
129        profileStatusResponse.getIdpSlotIds().forEach(idpSlotId -> {
130           Optional<Profile> profile = profiles.stream().filter(p -> p.getIdpId() == idpSlotId).findFirst();
131
132           if (profile.isEmpty()) {
133               messages.add(new IDPSettingsRequest(idpSlotId));
134           } else {
135               int segmentCount = profile.get().getIdpSettingsResponse().getNumberOfProfileSegments();
136               if (!profile.get().isComplete()) {
137                   for (int i=0; i<segmentCount; i++) {
138                       int finalI = i;
139                       if (profile.get().segments.stream().noneMatch(s -> s.getSegmentIndex() == finalI)) {
140                           messages.add(new IDPSegmentRequest(idpSlotId, i));
141                       }
142                   }
143               }
144           }
145
146        });
147
148        return messages;
149    }
150
151    public void processMessage(Message message) {
152        if (message instanceof ProfileStatusResponse) {
153            profileStatusResponse = (ProfileStatusResponse) message;
154            profiles.removeIf(p -> !profileStatusResponse.getIdpSlotIds().contains(p.getIdpId()));
155        } else if (message instanceof IDPSettingsResponse) {
156            int idpId = ((IDPSettingsResponse) message).getIdpId();
157            Optional<Profile> profile = profiles.stream().filter(p -> p.getIdpId() == idpId).findFirst();
158            if (profile.isPresent()) {
159                profile.get().processMessage(message);
160            } else {
161                profiles.add(new Profile((IDPSettingsResponse) message));
162            }
163            profiles.sort((a,b) -> profileStatusResponse.getIdpSlotIds().indexOf(a.getIdpId()) - profileStatusResponse.getIdpSlotIds().indexOf(b.getIdpId()));
164        } else if (message instanceof IDPSegmentResponse) {
165            int idpId = ((IDPSegmentResponse) message).getIdpId();
166            Optional<Profile> profile = profiles.stream().filter(p -> p.getIdpId() == idpId).findFirst();
167            if (profile.isPresent()) {
168                profile.get().processMessage(message);
169            }
170        }
171    }
172
173    public boolean isComplete() {
174        return profileStatusResponse != null && profiles.size() == profileStatusResponse.getNumberOfProfiles() && profiles.stream().allMatch(Profile::isComplete);
175    }
176
177    public List<Profile> getProfiles() {
178        Validate.isTrue(isComplete());
179        return profiles;
180    }
181
182    public Profile getActiveProfile() {
183        Validate.isTrue(isComplete());
184        int activeSlot = profileStatusResponse.getActiveIdpSlotId();
185        int activeIdpId = profileStatusResponse.getIdpSlotIds().get(activeSlot);
186        return getProfileWithIdpId(activeIdpId).orElseThrow();
187    }
188
189    public Optional<Profile> getProfileWithIdpId(int idpId) {
190        return profiles.stream().filter(p -> p.getIdpId() == idpId).findFirst();
191    }
192
193    public void clear() {
194        profiles.clear();
195        profileStatusResponse = null;
196    }
197
198    public Message createNewProfileMessage(String profileName, int firstSegmentProfileCarbRatio, int firstSegmentProfileBasalRate, int firstSegmentProfileTargetBG, int firstSegmentProfileISF, int profileInsulinDuration, int profileCarbEntry) {
199        return new CreateIDPRequest(profileName, firstSegmentProfileCarbRatio, firstSegmentProfileBasalRate, firstSegmentProfileTargetBG, firstSegmentProfileISF, profileInsulinDuration, profileCarbEntry);
200    }
201
202}
